section.p: As an OpenStack operator you are responsible for uninstalling agents, if required. The OpenStack extensions you have installed for your platform are uninstalled by the Monitoring Service operator.
Before uninstalling an agent, it is recommended that you make a backup of the configuration files created for operation. For details on backups, refer to .
To uninstall a Metrics Agent or a Log Agent, proceed as follows:

li.p: Log in to the Control Machine.
Open the configuration file of the Control Machine with your favorite editor.
Check that the hosts from which to uninstall an agent are configured correctly. Note that multiple instances of an agent are uninstalled if multiple hosts are specified in the file.
The IP address of the remote machines as well as the user name of the user who is to uninstall the agent must be specified.
li.note: The user who uninstalls the agent must have access to the corresponding hosts. Access as a user with root privileges is required.
